ygData.subject: RE: Digest Number 279
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, I play on Brell and my Enchanter is looking like she ll get more play time than my Bard.  Since I play her, I know she s honest. :P  As well, a guildmate
ygData.messageBody:
Well, I play on Brell and my Enchanter is looking like she'll
get more play time than my Bard. Since I play her, I know she's
honest. :P As well, a guildmate of another of my characters on
Brell is a power-played Enchanter. She is honest, and will more
than likely have far better skills to minimize risk of case a.

Ask around first.

BTW .. my honest jeweler is a Dark Elf named Deceit. The name is a
story ;) Luna is the Enchanter guildmate of my other character.

Melodie - Brell
Starling - Erollisi

At 02:43 PM 8/20/99 -0400, you wrote:
>From: "Webber, Jessica" <WebberJ@...>
>So, assuming I ever find myself fingering a black pearl in my pocket &
>negotiating a price with some jeweler, any recommendations for how to cover
>myself in case a) the jeweler fails, or b) the jeweler claims they failed,
>or c) the jeweler laughs, says "Sucker!" and starts to run away? This is
>assuming I'm not on a PvP server and can't kill him or her.
